mods:name.mods:namePart: Congress of Black Women of Canada

mods:mods.mods:abstract: Image consists of one round, yellow, metal button. At the centre is an image of three female figures in motion. Above the image the first line of black text reads: "Congress of Black Women of Canada". Below this line the black text reads: "On the move...forward together". Below the image in black text reads: "May 15-17, 1987". Below this text in black the text reads: "Vancouver, B.C.".
